name: RollTale
description:
Jump and avoid obstacles on the platform


Completion
Complete the level by passing through portals




It has a relaxing and stress-free gameplay structure.

Simplified GUI & Simple Gameplay

Optimized sections & Opening sections in order.

Different Music and Different Platforms at each level.

Levels
Different level and different music in each episode [Anime,Forest,DarkFantasy,Castle,Fairtale etc.]
